Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Chicago/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood, 75th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/90th
ShortDescription: NB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th & Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/90th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/90th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/ 63rd
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 63rd, Western, 59th and California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 63rd, Western, 59th and California then resume their normal route on California due to street blockage near California/ 63rd.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Adams
ShortDescription: #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Jackson, Austin, Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Jackson, Austin, Madison then resume their normal route at Central, due to fire department activity near Central/Adams
